name: Eric Blais
text: Good pizza at a decent price. I am not a fan of the minimum purchase amount to qualify for delivery, also the customer service over the phone needs serious improvement. I waited on hold for over 9 minutes just to place an order. However, because of that I did get my pizza for free after some polite haggling on my part.

name: Dave Zetti
text: Love the food and always fast service! The new assistant Ken is great! He introduced himself, was helpful, and made an excellent pizza for my kids and I. Only issue I have is every time I come into the store, the GM is never to be found, and if he is around he seems to be glued to his cell phone. Management change soon??

name: Ryan Waldron
text: Awesome pizza....fast....at a decent price....what more could you ask for? The worst thing about getting Papa John's is having to smell it on the drive home and not be able to eat it! Please open a location in the Lakes Region!!!!

name: Ashleigh Nicole
text: This place is great!! Very generous during the holidays and knows how to please their regulars!! I buy too much pizza I guessüòÇ‚ù§Ô∏è

text: I've ordered from here several times in the past few months, and contrary to some of the reviews on here, I've had good to great customer service. My most recent experience was great; they messed up cutting my pizza (wanted Chicago style). ‚Ä¶More

text: Sucky people, sucky product, sucky service. Only order here if you want good that'll make you sick and people that are high and rude.
